about_the_game:
Mother of Monsters - Player's Guide

Adapted from the 60-page  Mother of Monsters Player's Guide  brings your players insights into the politics and geography of their world, alongside new player options to create heroes unique to the Kagari Islands. This spoiler-free resource has all the information your player's need and nothing they don't, including new races, classes, feats, spells, and even a custom language!

Welcome to Kagari, a realm of war-torn island city-states, rampaging monsters, and dark cults--a place where pious people attribute their every fortune, good or bad, to the will of the gods. Its islands hold breathtaking beauty, yet hide terrible secrets within dark tombs and forbidding caves. Kagari! Where civilization exists upon the skeletons of societies long past.

Within these pages are insights into the politics and geography of the world of Kagari, alongside new player options to create heroes unique to this campaign. This spoiler-free resource has all the information your player's need and nothing they don't, including new races, classes, feats, spells, and even a custom language!

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Warren Carlsrud
